div.p:
Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per balliuos eiusdem octauo die
mensis maij Anno Domini mo iiijco lxxxmo Quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata et cetera

Eodem die gilbertus Waus super quem Alexander rede extendit plegium de iniusta deten
cione xlv solidorum ab eo pro plegiagio Jacobi Drapar' / primo die sepe vocatus respon
sure dicto plegio Non comparuit / quare precipitur philippo de Dunbrek sergeando quod ca
piat districtum a dicto gilberto ad valorem amerciati curie et cetera et quod premuniat ipsum ad
comparendum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam ad secundum diem huius processus

Item eodem die Willelmus blindsel iunior accusatus de iniusta perturbacione et percussione
Mariote striueline sponse Duncanj huntar negauit / et conuictus inde fuit per
assisam vnde adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie et emendare parti lese vt Jura volunt

The samyn dai Wilyam blindsel ane of the balyeis of this burgh strekit ane
borgh in the hand of Duncan straloch sergeand as forspekar' for cristian mortymer
and canne brig servandis til gilbert riburne and Dauid spens apon' sere John'
of striueline chaplan' / as he that was fundin in a fenssit court / aucht til
answer' in the samyn court for the wrangwis' strublance of the saidis cristian and canne
bot gif that he war lauchfully direnyeit and borowit fra the said court be
ane commission' / And the said ser John' avisit with his forspekaris sayde and alle
git that sen he was nocht apprehendit with na fresch strublance nor warnyt for
sic caus' to this day / he aucht nocht til answer' tharto / and gif thai had to folou
him tharapon' he suld answer' before his Juge ordinar' as efferit

In curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xijo die mensis maij
Anno Dominj supra dicto / Willelmus kemp anglicus magister cuiusdam nauis manucepit
probare die lune proximo futuro solucionem et satisfactionem ix solidorum g' factam per eum Roberto gil
berto quhite crag mercatori Ricardi henrison' in hac parte / de qua summa dictus Ricardus ca
lumpniauit prefatum Willelmum in presenti curia et cetera

Eodem die Dauid howison adiudicatus fuit in ijobus amerciamentis pro perturbio curie et quia
iniuste perturbauit patricium baidenach patrem in verbis iniuriosis et tenetur emendare eidem
ad visum proborum virorum

Item eodem die ballivi assignauerunt diem lune ad quindenam proximo futuro Jonete sowtar
et patricio badenach prelocutori et plegio eiusdem Jonete ex vna et Agneti baxtar
partibus ex altera / ad prosequendum respondendum et defendendum in actione plegij porrecti ex parte dicte
Agnetis contra prefatam Jonetam de iniusta intromissione cum vno'o' overwrites 'a'. jumento equa et in omnibus aliis punctis
dictam actionem concernentibus et illo die tanquam die peremptorio assignato cum consensu parcium
huiusmodi actio finietur absque vlteriori processu Juris

the samyn dai Androw Wenton' burges of Abirdene in presence of James comyng and Wil
yeam blindsel twa of the balyeis sittand in Jugement pait and content til Anne
the spous' of James of Kintor xx s' of the vsusale money of Scotland / the
quhilk some' scho optenit lauchfully apon' the said androw / of the Rest of vj li'
deliuerit til hir' be James of Wenton' merchand of a schip of Deip and the said
androw Wenton' / for certane salmond boght and ressauit fra hir be the said Ja
mes the quhilkis xx s' scho previt sufficiantly before ane sworn' assise
that scho wantit of the vj li' throu rekles and negligent telling of the said
money in the tym / and for the mare verificacion' scho swere the gret aith
that scho wantit samekil of the said some'

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xv die mensis maij anno Domini
mo iiijco lxxxmo /

quo die gilbertus quhite fatebatur se recepisse a Willelmo Kemp
anglico magistro cuiusdam nauis ex parte Ricardi henrici ix s' g' iuxta tenorem
vnius littere missiue ipsius Ricardi per dictum gilbertum in curia ostense et perlecte et cetera

The same dai be the decrete of the courte it wes ordanit and deliuerit / that gilbert
quhite salpay and content til Richart henrison' of the ix s' g' aboue writin
foure schillingis gretis waring in William Kempis schip now of this
last rays' / and the fyve s' g' remanand as the said skippar' has bo
rowit siluer fra vthir men and tomak the said payment within terme of law

Eodem die Johannes de marr in fotino conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento quia iniuste
perturbavit marioriam fresal et emendabit ei ad visum proborum virorum

Item eodem die Andreas goldsmyth prosecutus fuit per plegium Jacobum de
Douglas de iniusta detencione vnius barelle salmonum ab ipso andrea /
quo quidem Jacobo negan' / positum fuit ad assisam proborum virorum ad hoc Jura
torum / que assisa diligenter auisata Inuenit et deliberauit quod dictus Jacobus
iniuste detinet huiusmodi barellam salmonum a prefato Andrea / vnde adiudicatus
fuit in amerciamento curie et satisfacere eidem Andree de dicta barella salmonum infra terminum Juris

Agnes baxtar posuit se in voluntate ballivorum de amerciamento curie pro infrictione communis ordinis penes
iniustam empcionem certe quantitatis frumenti

Item eodem die Walterus rolland deuenit plegius legalis pro andrea branche de indempnitate
cristinj prat aliter quam per viam Juris Et eodem macolus mowet plegius pro dicto cristino et cetera

The samyn dai Comperit in Jugement before Wilyam blindsel and James comynge
twa of the balyeis of Abirdene / Agnes rolland the spous' of vmquhile thom of
schethin / and askit at Wat of aghnefe nyne pundis quhilkis pertenit til a barn'
of the said thomas callit Eby be reson' of a barnys part of gudis / And the said
Walter grantit the deliuerence of the said ix li' quhilkis was in his faderis hand
be way of tutory / til the said Agnes modir to the said Eby /. For the quhilkis the said
Agnes has fundin Thom rolland hir brothir souertie / that the said Walter salbe
scaithles / and that the said some' salbe furth cumand to the said Eby at his lauch
ful age / and falyeand of hir' to thame that has reson' tharto / Heratour the said
Walter grantit in Jugement that his fadir left in legasy to the said Eby ten
merkis / the quhilkis the said Walter his son' and ayr is oblist be his land and gudis
topay to the said Eby the said x merkis at hir lauchful age / and falyeand of
hir' to thaim that has reson' / And the said Agnes rolland is oblist be the faith
of hir body tokepe the said thomas rolland hir brothir scaithles of the said
souertie and borowgang / Alsua the said thomas rolland is cumin souertie to the bal
yeis for the gudis and ayrchip pertening til thomas schethin son' and ayr of quhilum
thomas schethin be reson' and law / that the saidis gudis and ayrschip salbe furth
cumand to the said barne quhat tyme / that he cumis til lauchful age / and failyeand
of him to thame that has reson' and richt tharto / And the said Agnes in like wise is ob
list be hir hand and gudis to kepe the said thomas hir brothir vnscathit of the said souertee

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per prepositum et ballivos eiusdem xxo die mensis maij
anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo /

quo die Willelmus Kemp anglicus fatebatur se debere Johanni malisson
x s' / quare ballivi precipiebant eo ad satisfaciendum dictam summam sponse prefati Johannis tunc presenti infra xvnam

Eodem die actio plegij prosecuta per Dauid hil aduersus Willelmum Kemp anglicum de iniusta intro
missione et detencione dimidii barelle salmonum a dicto Dauid / positum fuit ad assisam proborum
burgensium ad hoc Juratorum / quj mature auisati dixerunt quod dictum plegium fuit va
loris / vnde Willelmus Kemp adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione dicti dimidij
barelle salmonum a Dauid hil / et ad satisfaciendum eidem infra terminum Juris

The samyn dai before the aldirman and balyeis in Jugement maistir Androw cadiow
has stapillit and fundin Robert blindsel and James comyng twa of the balyeis of
abirdene borowis and souertie for him and in his name til answer' and to do that law wil
before our Soueran lord and his consel / til ony man that has toclame William
Kemp inglisman thare presonar' / as for his ranson' becaus' the said mastir Androw
has intromettit with him calland him his presonar . And the said Robert blindsel allegit
that he has tayn the said William Kemp as presonar til him lang tym of before and
protestit for his rycht quharapon / the said James comyng is cumin souertie til ansuer'
anent his clame as forsaid is

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xxiiijto die mensis
maij anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo /

quo die curia affirmata Johannes lilburne
accusatus pro inordinata vigilacione de nocte et pro iniusta perturbacione et per
cussione petrj teutonici negauit dictam calumpniam vnde hoc fuit positum ad
assisam proborum virorum / quj Jurati et mature auisati deliberarunt dictum Johannem
reum de actionibus prenotatis et conuictum de eisdem quare adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie
pro perturbio dicti petri et emendare eidem ad visum proborum virorum

Item Dauid theman et Johannes Westland accusacione precedente conuictus fuerunt
per eandem assisam tanquam vigilatores de nocte inordinate

Eodem die thomas martyn amerciatur quia iniuste perturbavit quendam anglicum ut
compertum fuit per assisam et Ideo tenetur emendare ei vt Jura volunt

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxvj die mensis et annj predictorum / henricus lorn posuit
se in voluntate ballivorum pro perturbio curie
Dauid bevirla et Johannes Douglas quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbio adinuicem prout compertum fuit per assisam
Alexander bevirlay amerciatur pro perturbacione Johannis Douglas quia negavit acquitare se et cetera

Eodem die assisa Reperit quod forsy manens in futy iniuste intromisit cum quodam homine
fyndelai fores et Ideo adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie et cetera

Item eodem die ballivi assignauerunt Johanni gregory hodie ad octo dies si dies illa Ju
ridica fuerit alioquin xx diem Juridicam inde sequen' ad respondendum plegio per Alexandrum hay
contra ipsum extenso de iniusta intromissione et recepcione vnius pety quarterij salis
alias per eundem Johannem de li busch de fer / et de parte sua alterius petty quarterij tocius salis
eiusdem nauis / dicto alexandro pertinen' et per prefatum Johannem iniuste recept' et cetera

The samyn dai in presence of worshipful men that is tosay mastir Richart forbes
dene of Abirdene maistir Alexander the Waus commissar' of the samyn Alexander of chamer
aldirman Wilyam comyng of cultir John' of marr' Dauid colison' and Alexander of marr' with othiris
It is appointit and accordit betuix ser Walter young chaplan and Marion' glenny
his modir / that the said ser Walter salhaf the forechamyr of the land pertening
til hir liand in the galougate mail fre for hir life tyme / for the quhilk
he sal ger poynt the sammyn and wphald it in sufficiant poynting durand the
said tyme / scho payand the xx s' of annuel aucht yerly of the hail land

Curia ballivorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxixno die mensis
maij anno quo supra /

quo die curia affirmata patricius badenach ex parte Jonete sowtar
extendit plegium in manu Duncani straloch seriandi / quod dicta Joneta quita fuit de clameo Agnetis
baxtar penes vnum Jumentum / pro eo quod ista dies erat peremptorie partibus assignat' et non
comparuit dicta Agnes ad prosequendum prefatam Jonetam tunc presens et cetera

The samen dai in presence of Robert blindsel ane of the bailyeis of this burgh James comyng and
Wilyam blindsel twa of the balyeis of the samyn Comperit in the court James clerk the
quhilk oblist him be the faith of his body til content and pay til ser Androw Wrycht chaplan
the some' of twenty twa schillingis and aucht pennyis of vsuale money betuix this and
lammes nixt tocum aucht be him to the said ser androw Wrycht of a mare some' / but ony
langar delay fraude or gile / And falyeand of the payment of the said soume at the
dai forsaid / the said James has bundin his gudis to the said ser androw tobe tane poyndit
and analeit be him at his awne wil / quhil he be fullely pait and assithit of the
said some'
Jacobus de Douglas amerciamento curie pro iniusta extensione plegij super henricum owrum et cetera

Eodem die Robertus tevidale adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie quia iniuste Recessit a seruicio
beati Nicholai / et in alio amerciamento pro perturbio curie prout compertum fuit et deliberatum per assisam

Thomas quhite super quem Johannes ska nauta extendit plegius de iniusta detencione xviij s'
ab eo / adiudicatur in amerciamento per concessionem propriam pro iniusta detencione dicte summe et cetera

Curia burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per Jacobum comyng vnum ballivorum eiusdem secundo die
mensis Junij anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo /

quo die Willelmus de Kynlos conuictus per assisam adiu
dicatur in amerciamento quia iniuste percussit et perturbavit Agnetem ancroft et tenetur emendare parti le
se ad visum proborum virorum / Vnde assisa ordinavit ipsum Willelmum in parte emende ad soluendum
dicte Agneti ij s' / Et si ammodo conuincatur pro tali perturbio cuiuscumque vicinj huius burgi soluet
ad voluntatem ballivorum et assise x s'

Eodem die Johannes gregory primo die vocatus ad sectam alexandri hay super plegio alias
per eum super dictum Johannem extenso / Non comparuit Ideo precipitur philippo de Dunbrek seriando ca
pere districtum de dicto Johanne et cetera et premunire ipsum ad comparendum ad curiam legalem tenendam
die lune ad quindenam tanquam ad secundam diem processus / Et dictus Alexander casu quo contingat ipsum
non esse presentem / constituit gilbertum leche suum procuratorem in huiusmodi causa promittens de Rato et cetera

The samen dai James of Douglas has drawin be his hand al and sindri his gudis moua
bil and vnmouabil souertie til philp of Dunbrek seriand / for the payment of a barel
of Salmond optenit apon him be Androw goldsmyth / that he sal pay the said barel of
salmond ful rede and swete til the said Andro betuix this and lammes next tocum
And falyeand of the payment of the said barrel of salmond at the dai forsaid / the said James
is oblist topay and content to the said androw alsmekil redy siluer for the said barrel of sal
mond at the said fest of lammes as ony barrel of salmond beis sald for / the said tym
and of the hiest price but ony langar delay giffand power' to the said seriand til tak
and price his gudis at his awne wil / for the payment tobe maid as said is til androw
goldsmyth / falyeand that the said James mak nocht payment his self as is before expremit

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per Robertum blindsel Jacobum comyng et thomam prat
tres ballivorum eiusdem quinto die Junij anno Domini supradicto /

quo die curia affirmata Willelmus de stra
bolgy inuenit gilbertum Waus plegium legalem pro eo de indempnitate fratris Willelmi paxton' aliter
quam per viam Juris

Eodem die breue impetratum per Johannem lilburne Respectuatur et continuatur de consensu
parcium vsque hodie ad quindenam in eodem vigore forma pariter et effectu vt nunc existit
propter debilitatem curie / absque preiudicio alicuius partis / et proclamacionis breuis antedicti primus fact'
partibus hinc inde fidemedia obligatis ad continuacionem dicti breuis

Item eodem die Willelmus quelp conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento quia iniuste perturbauit
Ricardum bynny seruitorem Johannis colison' et tenetur emendare eidem ad visum proborum virorum

Eodem die ballivi assignauerunt diem veneris proximo / henrico owrum cum consensu eiusdem responsurus
Willelmo hay penes compotum et solucionem v barelle salmonum fiend' dicto Willelmo / cui ipse henricus fuit
mercator in hac parte et cetera

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem vjto die Junij anno Domini et cetera
lxxxmo /

quo die Dauid mathoson' posuit se in voluntate ballivorum pro iniusta perturbacione
vxoris Alexandri rede in verbo pro qua perturbacione adiudicatur in amerciamento curie per concessio
nem propriam et emendare parte ad visum proborum virorum / Et pro emenda fienda et recipienda
ballivi assignauerunt diem veneris ad octo dies / dicto alexandro pro vxore sua in Judicio comparen' et cetera

Eodem die Alexander rede inuenit Willelmum hay plegium legalem pro eo / quod Dauid ma
thei erit indempnis de eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris Et gilbertus morison'
deuenit plegius legalis pro dicto Dauid de indempnitate prefati alexandri et partis sue vt supra

Item eodem die penes debatam curatorie Willelmi mathei inter alexandrum rede et Dauid ma
thei / ballivi assignauerunt partibus diem veneris ad octo dies / pro ordinacione et deliberacione prepositi
et consilij inde fiend'

Item quidam laurencius in amerciamento quia non comparere fecit quendam Dauid ad calumpniam ballivorum in hac
curia prout deuenit plegius pro eodem

Eodem die actio mota inter thomam symson' / et Adam andirson penes Redempcionem vnius
orrei cum cauda eiusdem et penes testes producendos in eadem actione continuatur et respectuatur
vsque ad crastinam propter debilitatem curie cum consensu parcium partibus hinc inde obligatis
ad huiusmodi continuacionem et apud actum citatis

In curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem vijo die Junij anno quo supra
Actio pendens inter thomam symson et adam andirson' continuata ad hunc die vt pre
scribitur / adhuc propter debilitatem curie ponitur in dilacione in in eadem forma et effec
tu in quibus nunc existit vsque ad crastinam diem absque preiudicio parcium Et dictus Adam
per Jacobum comyng suum prelocutorem obtulit se subire detencionem et deliberacionem assise
predie electe et Jurate ad decisionem dicte cause / et deficien' aliquibus aut
aliquo eiusdem assise vt alij aut alius loco absen' elegantur aut elegatur

Eodem die edana elmisle fatebatur se debere / Jacobo clerk pro firma domus se de
terminis transactis x s' et quod satisfaciet Roberto blindsel ex parte eiusdem Jacobi de
dicta summa infra viij dies futuras
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem viijuo die Junij anno et cetera lxxxmo
quo die Willelmus henrison in amerciamento pro perturbio mariorie besat / et emendabit dampnum sufficienter

Eodem die comparuit in curia coram ballivis Adam andirson cum prelocutore suo Jacobo cumyng
offerens se promptum et paratam responsurus et Juri periturus in actione mota et pendenti inter ipsum
adam et thomam symson' / continuata in hunc diem et ad perimplendum formam acti continuacionis predie inde
facti / ac omnia et singula ex parte ipsius ade oblat' penes dictam causam / protestando quod ex quo
fuit pars rea ut asseruit expectando aduentum prefati thome actorum ad habendum decisionem dicte
materie / hora causarum pro tunc preterita et vltima / et non comparuit dictus thomas quod sibi concedantur littere testimo
niales / quod dicta causa non remanet indecisa in defectu dicti ade / ac eciam quod quitus fuit a
clameo predicti thome symson tanquam pro isto die et quousque nouiter fuerit ad legem attachiatus
et dicto Adam remoto curia decreuit quod fuit legittimum tempus diei pro introitu parcium / et quod idem
adam illud tempus expectauit
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem ixo die Junij anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo

quo die thomas hyne piscator accusatus de inobediencia officiarum et quia recessit extra pretorium bis
absque licensia / idem thomas per fynlaum fores suum prelocutorem posuit se in voluntate de dicta calumpnia et cetera

Eodem die Willelmus hay accusatus de iniusta perturbacione henrici owrum / posuit se in voluntate
ballivorum / et ideo adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie et emendare eidem ad visum proborum virorum
Joneta suod per concessionem propriam in amerciamento quia iniusta perturbavit puerum Jonete menyes

the samyn dai the balyeis be the decrete of the court has assignit til henry owrum
this dai xv dais as day of peremptour til answer' as law wil til Wilyam the hay
is bil / and tomak rekning and payment til the said William as merchand to marchande
of v barrelis of salmond clamyt be him

Andreas lowson in amerciamento quia non intrauit / kelach carnificem pro quo deuenit plegius veluti premunitus
fuit vt probatus fuit in curia

Item the said dai the assise fand and deliuerit that gilbert the Waus aw til content and pay til
Dauid Duncan ij merkis and demi / for ony payment that he has gottin hiddirtillis as the
said gilbert allegit et cetera

In curia ballivorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xo die mensis et annj predictorum Johannes
stewart per confessionem propriam adiudicatur in amerciamento curie quia iniuste perturbavit Johannem culan et te
netur emendare ei ad visum proborum virorum / Et dictus Johannes culan posuit se in voluntate bal
livorum de iniusta perturbacione prefati Johannis stewart et emendabit ei vt super

Eodem die Johannes culan inuenit Andream culam plegium legalem pro eo quod Johannes stewart erit
indempnis aliter quam per viam Juris Et Willelmus blindsel senior deuenit plegius legalis pro Johanne stew
art de indempnitate dicti Johannis culan aliter quam Jura volunt

Johannes scot ex propria concessione adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro violenta wlneracione et percussione
cuiusdam thome et tenetur emendare parti lese ad visum proborum virorum

the samyn dai comperit before the balyeis in Jugement alexander rolland with his forspekar'
James cumyng and askit at alexander rolland Rede payment and contentacion of a certane
some' of monee restand vnpait of ane obligacion in the quhilk the said alexander rede and Johne
Wormot ar bundin and oblist til him coniunctlie and seueraly as dettouris for maistir
thomas the Waus quhilum chantour of murra / and becaus' he couth get na payment of
the remanand of the said obligacion' / he has protestit for his costis and scathis made and
sustenit be him in defaute of payment / sayand that he wald persew it before vthir Jugis
sen he can get bot dilatouris before his Juge ordinar'

Marioria et Johannes henrison quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbio adinuicem prout deliberatum fuit per assisam
que ordinavit quod dicta marioria dabit in emendam dimidii libre cere ad missam sancti sanguinis et quod
de cetero non faciant similem perturbacionem sibi pena x s' applicand' ad fabricam ecclesie beati nicholai
de parte delinquen' sine remissione et cetera
Item dictus Johannes henrison in amerciamento per confessionem propriam pro perturbio curie

Eodem die Inuentum fuit et decretum per curiam quod Alexander sanquhar' tenetur satisfacere Dauid
Duncanj seriendo xviij s' ex parte Willelmi rate / pro quibus dictus Dauid deuenit plegius dicto Willelmo
nomine prefati alexandri / et quod satisfaciet dictam summam infra quindenam futuram

In curia burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per Robertum blindsel vnum ballivorum eiusdem xiijo die Junij anno
Domini et cetera lxxxmo / idem ballivus ex decreto curie assignauit patricio smyth hodie ad octo dies
responsurus Ricardo litstar super plegio per eum extenso aduersus dictum patricium penes le wad' / et illo
die idem Ricardus respondebit plegio contra ipsum porrecto per dictum patricium vt Jura volunt

Eodem die certe persone electe pro emenda fienda cuidam thome grauiter leso et wlnerato
per Johannem scot / ordinauerunt eundem Johannem soluere dicto thome qualibet ebdomida viij d'
dummodo fuerit plenarie solutus de v s'

the samyn dai the assise has decretit and ordanit / that Wat pyot sal mak a bil of
rekning til Dauid Duncan of the selling of his quhite claith / and that he sal content
and pay til the said Dauid alsfer as the clath extendis to / x s' for ilke pruys' merk

xiiij die mensis et annj predictorum / coram thoma prat vno ballivorum / nobilis vir Willelmus de Keith filius et
apparens heres Gilberti Keith de Inueriugy militis constituit Jacobum coming suum procuratorem ad pe
tendum et recuperandum nomine ipsius constitutis ab Alexandro hay v nobilia in quibus sibi tenetur pro j barrella de le
grils et pro duabus partibus barella salmonum in latissima forma procuratorie
Curia ballivorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvj die Junij anno quo supra /

quo die Robertus
mernach posuit se in voluntate Roberti blindsel vnius ballivorum de iniusta empcione piscium in quantitate
antequam deseruiatur burgensibus ville / quare adiudicatur in amerciamento et cetera

henricus lichton pardonarius accusatus de iniusta perturbacione et disobediencia philippi de Dunbrek
alexandri de camera et Dauid Duncanj seriendorum / negavit et conuictus inde fuit per assisam et pro pertur
bio adiudicatur in amerciamento curie et emendare dampnum ad visum proborum virorum / et ista fecit dictis
seriendis suum officium ministran' et cetera

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xixno die
mensis Junij anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata et cetera

Eodem die Willelmus huntar adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione vnius olle a
Jacobo Douglas / et ad restituendum eidem dictam ollam infra terminum Juris

Inquisicionis nomina Robertus culan Dauid symson' gilbertus Waus Johannes stevinson
Ricardus de culan Johannes Waus iunior alexander nachty Willelmus moore Robertus prat
Symon de gardin Ranaldus talyour Johannes gregory Willelmus gray Donaldus strathachin et
Willelmus andirson burgenses de abirdene Qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam Angusius lilburne pater
Johannis lilburn latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem
domini nostri Regis de vno annuo Redditu xiij s' et iiijor d' vsualis monete Scocie exeunt'
annuatim et leuand' de terra sine tenemento dicti quondam Angusij Jacente infra burgum de abirdene
ex parte boriali vici castri inter terram hered' Johannis litstar ex parte orientali ex vna
et terram thome malisson ex parte occidentali partibus ex altra Et quod dictus Johannes est legittimus
et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam Angusij patris sui de dicto annuo redditu cum pertinenciis et quod
est legittime etatis / et de valore eiusdem annuj redditus satis patet Et quod tenetur in
capite de domino nostro Rege in libero burgagio Et quod nunc existit in manibus dicti domini nostri
Regis a tempore obitus dicti Angusij quj obiit per spacium xiij annorum preteritorum vel eocirca
in defectu veri heredis Jus suum minime prosequentis

Eodem die alexander hay calumpniavit per plegium Johannem gregory de iniusta detencione vnius
petty quarterij salis alias recept' per eundem Johannem de li busch de fer' et de parte sua
alterius petty quarterij tocius salis eiusdem nauis / qui negavit iniustam detencionem / vnde leua
ta fuit assisa proborum burgensium videlicet Alexandri rede gilberti Waus Johannis Waus
iunioris Ricardi culan Jacobi craik Roberti prat Ranaldi talyour Willelmi gray Simonis gardin et
Willelmi necolson' / quj Jurati et mature auisati inuenerunt et dixerunt quod Johannes
gregory iniuste detinet dictam quantitatem salis ab alexandro hay / quare adiudicatur in
amerciamento curie et ad satisfaciendum infra terminum Juris

In curia ballivorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxo die Junij anno et cetera lxxxmo Elena
malisson extendit plegius super moricium besat de iniusta detencione xviij solidorum ab ea alias dicto
moricio et patricio besat quondam fratri suo per ipsam prestat' / vnde prefatus moricius peciit diem
legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio / et ballivi cum consensu eiusdem moricij assignauerunt eidem hodie ad xvnam
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per balliuos eiusdem xxijdo die mensis et annj predictorum

quo die Dauid hil burgensis dicti burgi accusatus de inobediencia et iniusta perturbacione
philippi de Dunbrek vnius seriendorum faciendo officium suum et de iniusta fractione vnius crathere argen
tie venerabili viro magistro Johannj hay Rectori de crowdan' pertinen' / negavit dictam ca
lumpniam / Vnde leuata fuit assisa proborum burgensium infrascriptorum videlicet Alexandri rede alexandri
howison' Dauid symson' gilberti Waus Johannis Wormot Willelmi hay alexandri
nachtieThere is a manicula in left margin, with a finger pointing to 'nachtie'. andree murray senioris Edmundi hay Johannis litstar Willelmi andree Dauid galycht
lie et Jacobi Kennarty / Qui Jurati et diligenter ac mature auisati dixerunt quod Dauid
hil reus erat et conuictus de actionibus prenotatis / Et pro perturbio seriendi et fractione crathere
adiudicatur in ijobus amerciamentis curie et emendare dampnium ut Jura volunt / Et in partem emende
assisa ordinavit quod dictus Dauid dabit vnam petram cere ad missam Sancti sanguinis

Johannes harpar et Johannis filius eius conuicti per assisam quilibet in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Roberti
de crag et emendabunt ei ad visum proborum virorum Et idem Robertus amerciatur pro perturbio dicti
Johannis harpar senioris in verbo / Vnde assisa ordinavit quod dictus Johannes cum filio dabunt j libram cere ad
missam sancti sanguinis / videlicet ipsorum quilibet dimidium li' et cetera

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxvij die Junij anno Dominj et cetera
lxxxmo

The samyn dai Johne Wormot clamyt William moyses of xx s' or xxij s' acht til
him of the rest of a mare some' compt and rekning as he sayde / Ande the said Wilyam
askit at the said Johne gif he acht him or mycht clame him of ony mare det than
of the xx or xxij s' as said is / and the said Johne answerit that he acht him na mare
that he wist of / wpon' the quhilk the said Wilyam askit / the record of the court et cetera

In the balye court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene the xxviij dai of June the yer'
forsaid . In the action movit be Wilyam the hay againis henry owrum as merchand
til him in that part / of v barrelis of salmond / the assise tharupon chosin and sworn weil an ry
pli avisit / fand determynit and deliuerit be thomas fife forspekar of the samyn assise
that henry owrum suld content and pay the said Wilyam the hay of twa barellis of salmond
xxiiij s' g' for ilke barel be the said henryis awn' grant that he sald thaim for / And
gif the said Wilyam may mak it gude / that thai war derrer sald / he sal content him
als' dere as thai war' sald / And of the iij barrelis of Salmond remanand / the said henry
is quyte becaus' he intromettit nocht with thaim and did for thame as he did for his awn'
gude / for the said henry declarit be his aith / that thai ly in lokyn laris hande /
and that he couth get na rekning of thaim
Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem tercio die Julij anno Domini predicto

quo die Willelmus quelp accusatus conuictus fuit per assisam de iniusta perturbacione
Duncanj sanquhar' de murcroft pro qua adiudicatur in amerciamento et emendare eidem ad
visum proborum virorum Et Idem Duncanus accusatus quietus factus fuit per assisam de pertur
bio dicti Willelmi quelp

In the balye court haldin in the tolbuthe the vij dai of Julij the yer' forsaid / comperit
William of Dunbrek and grantit that he passit til loyk laris and askit at him commpt
and rekning of a barel of salmond quhilk pertenit til Richard henrison and was
apon his merk / the quhilk the said loyk as he sais grantit til him that he had
a barrel of salmond of a mark callit a Raik / and that that barel extendit to
of free siluer xj s' g' vj g' ij inglis / And attour the said Wilyam bindis him
gif he or ony of his behalf has tane wp the some' beforewritin or ony
part of it / topay to the said Richard as the hiest siluer is lent hame fra
flandris to scotland

The viij dai of Julij before writin In the tolbuthe before thomas prat ane of the bal
yeis in Jugement sittand thom of ogston' grantit him borch til Wilyam blindsel yungar
of xviij stan' of wol / quhilkis the balye chargit him topay within xv dais / quhar
apon' he has fundin John' Wormot souertie tocomper' before the balyeis in the tolbuth
within xv dais todo that law and reson' wil anent the payment of the said wol
And the said Wilyam blindsel be his hand has fundin his land and gudis souertie to do that
law wil twicheing the said thom of ogstonis clame in like wise / the said tyme et cetera
